name: subrgrcl

stmt.origin: simpld(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(c1, crg), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), crg))

body.origin:

⊢ (c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1)→ c1 ∈ Ring)
